channel.title: [Hyperion] Help with making this packet
channel.description:
I am trying to make a packet to handle clicking an item, and I have gotten pretty far, called the packet in configuration.cfg, Made it, I am trying to make it notice an item Id tho.. I am using this code:
[code] private int id = Item.getId(); [/code] but it says I cannot access Item.getId(); from a static reference, I have been working on this, but cannot quite get it.

item.title: [Hyperion] Help with making this packet
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

No comment… Going to teamview him and set him strait. I’d suggest a mod lock this before he is flamed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] Help with making this packet
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I am trying to make a packet to handle clicking an item, and I have gotten pretty far, called the packet in configuration.cfg, Made it, I am trying to make it notice an item Id tho… I am using this code:

private int id = Item.getId();

but it says I cannot access Item.getId(); from a static reference, I have been working on this, but cannot quite get it.

Read full topic
